name: ext-obs
description: Metrics snapshot + OpenMetrics + OTLP encoding/export (contracts-as-data under arch/obs).
docs:
Metrics snapshot + OpenMetrics rendering + OTLP encoding/export pinned by arch/obs contracts.

Modules:
- std.obs.metrics
- std.obs.openmetrics
- std.obs.otlp
- std.obs.export
- std.obs.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-obs@0.1.2
- For production export, use std.obs.export.otlp_http_export_from_arch_v1 with profiles under arch/obs.
